dialogue.text: I noticed you had a chart autosaved. I dunno what happened before, whether your game had been closed, your battery had died,
or what, but that's none of my concern... Anyway, I've gone ahead and loaded that autosave for you.
Hope that helps you get back to what you were doing!
And hey. If you want me to no longer do this in the future, come let me know in the Options menu.
Anyway, I'll get out of your way now!
